title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 27 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Aug 27 2021
description:
Clay and Buck welcome to the show Jack Carr, former Navy SEAL sniper and Task Unit Commander with service in Afghanistan and Iraq to discuss the ongoing crisis in Afghanistan. Florida activist court takes on Governor DeSantis. You can mandate masks, but you can't mandate freedom from masks. Supreme Court slaps down Biden's eviction moratorium, 6-3 margin; landlords have the right to their property again. NYC employee: Should I get vaxxed or lose my job? Buck: "It's scary how the Democrat progressive impulse is: even if it's unconstitutional, let's just do it, let's just see what we can get away with, let's see if maybe activist judges will bail us out, let's see if we can do this for as long as we want."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Clay and Buck welcome to the show Jack Carr, former Navy SEAL sniper and Task Unit Commander with service in Afghanistan and Iraq to discuss the ongoing crisis in Afghanistan. Florida activist court takes on Governor DeSantis. You can mandate masks, but you can't mandate freedom from masks. Supreme Court slaps down Biden's eviction moratorium, 6-3 margin; landlords have the right to their property again. NYC employee: Should I get vaxxed or lose my job? Buck: "It's scary how the Democrat progressive impulse is: even if it's unconstitutional, let's just do it, let's just see what we can get away with, let's see if maybe activist judges will bail us out, let's see if we can do this for as long as we want."
